column1:
Conjugate in the present perfect.
gustar
to like (intr.), to please
column2:
gustar
(Present Perfect)
(a mí) me ha gustado
(a tí) te ha gustado
(a él, ella, Ud.) le ha gustado
(a nosotros) nos ha gustado
(a vosotros) os ha gustado
(a ellos, Uds.) les ha gustado
Note that the conjugation of gustar depends on the quantity of what is being liked, not who is doing the liking, meaning that haber will not always be 'ha'.
Ex. We have liked the book. Nos ha gustado el libro.
I have liked the books. Me han gustado los libros.
